description: The National Research Council Canada at Ottawa has a requirement for a project that includes the concrete beam column and wall remediation in the Council’s Building M-6. The works covered by this contract include the continuation of remediation efforts of the building M-6 by attending to identified deficiencies in concrete, removing and replacing of columns and walls as required and subsequent restoration of utilities services and demolitions and removal of any impacted portions of the roof, which included other minor repairs necessary to complete the project. It involves inter alia: designs, clientcare relationships, the forensic investigation of the problem and their solution, and the observation and monitoring of progress for the overall project. The project will proceed in accordance with the Council's standard project delivery practices
